member.name: T:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Controls.Navigation.SfTabControl
member.summary: Represents a control that contains multiple items that share the same space for content on the screen.
member.remarks: TabControl is a which means it can contain a collection of objects of any type (such as string, image, or panel) and it is selectable.
